activities: We receive individuals email addresses from the individual's Company which are used to email requested course assignments.  Individuals and their Companies may opt out at any time by making a request via email.  Email addresses are used for the sole purpose of communicating course assignments.  The online privacy policy details use, user choice and provides a simple mechanism for opt-out / submitting questions / providing feedback / complaints & disputes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client email addresses collected online and offline.
recoursemech: Individuals are first encouraged to contact BayGroup International directly with any concerns or complaints via the contact information listed on this site or via email privacy@baygroup.com.  If the initial resolution is not satisfactory, BayGroup International will commit to cooperate with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and/or the Swiss Data Protection Authority and their authorized representatives.
